html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-17152009-10-07,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRemission of debt authority following the negotiation of an out-of-court settlement with Part II Broadcasting Licence Fees payers
PrecisOn condition that the appeal pending before the Supreme Court of Canada be discontinued, Order approving the remission to all licensees, including those who are appellants before the Supreme Court of Canada, of the licence fees payable under paragraph 3(b) of the Broadcasting Licence Fee Regulations, 1997, for the return years 2006, 2007 and 2008, as well as any interest payable in respect of those fees, and of costs awarded to Her Majesty in right of Canada against those appellants by the Federal Court of Appeal in its decision of April 28, 2008, and accrued interest in respect of those costs.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
